barcodeID.title: Ticket Bar Code
barcodeID.description: Unique bar code assigned to a ticket.

deliveryMethod.title: Delivery Method
deliveryMethod.description: Ticket Delivery Method, for example, postal or digital.

rowName.title: Seat Row Name
rowName.description: Seat row name as printed on the ticket

seatingArea.title: Seating Area
seatingArea.description: Seating area as printed on ticket

seatName.title: Seat Name
seatName.description: Seat name as printed on ticket.

sectionCategory.title: Seating Section Category
sectionCategory.description: Category of section, used to describe tier of ticket, balcony, box, etc...

sectionGroup.title: Seating Section Group
sectionGroup.description: Section Group as presented on ticket

sectionLevel.title: Seating Section Level
sectionLevel.description: Section Level as presented on ticket.

sectionName.title: Seating Section Name
sectionName.description: Section name as presented on the ticket.

sectionRowName.title: Seating Section Row Name
sectionRowName.description: Seating section row name as presented on ticket.

ticketClassGroupName.title: Ticket Class Group Name
ticketClassGroupName.description: Group name of the ticket class.

ticketType.title: ticketType
ticketType.description: Enum: Type of ticket purchase, season, package, or single ticket.
